Headline: #54B South Cicero Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cicero/33rd
ShortDescription: NB 54B South Cicero buses are rerouted via Cicero, Pershing, Laramie, 31st, then will resume their normal route on Cicero due to  street blockage nr Cicero/33rd

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Pershing, Laramie, 31st, then will resume their normal route on Cicero due to a street blockage near Cicero/33rd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
